document.full_text: news agencies reported on monday that the yemeni air force was responding with bombing runs to islamist militants who were consolidating control over a second city on the southern coast.
document.title: yemeni military battles opponents on two fronts
lines_and_colors: news agencies reported on monday that the yemeni air force was responding with bombing runs to islamist militants who were consolidating control over a second city on the southern coast.
